title: Former Blackwater Security Guards Found Guilty In Iraq Shootings
teaser: A federal jury found four former security guards with the company Blackwater guilty in connection with the shooting of dozens of Iraqi citizens in 2007 at a Baghdad traffic circle. That shooting revealed the leeway given outside contractors and became a symbol of the U.S. intervention in Iraq.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
